text:
Hi!

It's not possible to remove the first valve from the default
Pipeline-Implementatation.

There was no special code for first, only for "re-pointing" the next elements.


Sorry, I do not have the code at hand right now, but simply try to add a valve
ant remove it - see, it's still there.

Bye

Chris
creator: cb.betz@knowit-software.de
yoavs@computer.org
text:
Please provide a ready-to-test WAR or another setup so we can reproduce the
behavior you report.  Until that happens, we treat this issue as invalid.

creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
text:
Reopening so I can find it again.

This is a bug in StandardPipeline.removeValve, but it's such a minority use-
case that I haven't been in a rush to patch it.  I should get to it before 
5.5.10 gets roled.

creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
text: This has been fixed in the CVS, and will appear in 5.5.10
